subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: After finding all the right answers in the second half of last season, Kurt Busch and the crew chief Pat Tryson are brimming with confidence heading into the new campaign.
snippet: After finding all the right answers in the second half of last season, Kurt Busch and the crew chief Pat Tryson are brimming with confidence heading into the new campaign.
